entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is one of the four houses in Hogwarts. It is mentioned that Ravenclaw was drawing nearer and nearer.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts who is trying to get his Firebolt broom back. He is asking Professor McGonagall for news of the Firebolt after every Transfiguration lesson.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is in charge of checking the Firebolt broom. She tells Harry that he can't have it back yet because they are still checking for curses.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts who is standing hopefully at Harry's shoulder while he asks Professor McGonagall about the Firebolt.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts who rushes past with her face averted while Harry is asking Professor McGonagall about the Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a broom that belongs to Harry Potter. It has been taken away by the school and is being checked for curses.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick believes that the Firebolt might be carrying a Hurling Hex.

entities.name: hurling hex
entities.description: The Hurling Hex is a curse that Professor Flitwick believes the Firebolt might be carrying.

entities.name: anti-dementor lessons
entities.description: Harry's anti-dementor lessons are not going well. He is able to produce an indistinct silvery shadow every time the boggart-dementor approaches him.
